content: 6 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 3 sts remain p1 k1 p1 round 5 k1 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 2 sts remain p1 k1 work round 1 from this 3rd set a final time to finish the diamond pattern work 1 round in curry as normal you will have worked a total of 28 rnds in curry begin working in burgundy work 2 rnds *2nd round has decreases as follows decrease round k2tog k until 2 sts remain ssk 41 sts begin working in yellow work 6 rnds begin working in white work 2 rnds *on 2nd round k2tog at start of round k to end of round this makes an even number of sts for the cuff ribbing 40 sts ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 8 of 9 cuff ribbing switch to 2 5mm needles and begin working in purple work 8 rnds in k1 p1 rib *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round begin working in curry work 1 round in k1 p1 rib *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round cast off in a stretchy bind off finishing weave in ends block and lay flat to dry the final step is to sew on the buttons congratulations your diamonds for baby cardigan is complete if you wish to share photos of your finished piece i would love to see your work you can include the hashtag #diamondsforbabycardigan and tag me @tiemeinknits you can find me here for all things knitting instagram @tiemeinknits ravelry tiemeinknits copyright notice all contents of this knitting pattern including texts photographs and graphics are protected by copyright the copyright is owned by vraja leader 2024 do not distribute this pattern without permission this pattern is for personal use only ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 9 of 9
